message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $10,000 right now.  What do you think?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11,500 for it.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. I'm still a bit stretched, but I could do $11,000.  Let's try to find some common ground here.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $11,250, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
